claim: You can buy chlorine at a dollar store.

supporting.text: Many dollar stores carry small quantities of household cleaning products, including chlorine bleach, for basic cleaning needs.

attacks.text: Many dollar stores carry small quantities of household cleaning products, including chlorine bleach, for basic cleaning needs.
Not all dollar stores stock chlorine bleach, as inventory varies by location and supplier availability.
Major dollar store chains like Dollar Tree and Dollar General consistently include chlorine bleach in their product lineup.
Chlorine bleach sold at dollar stores may be diluted or lower quality compared to standard retail brands.
Independent tests show dollar store chlorine bleach meets the same concentration standards as name-brand products.

supporting.text: Chlorine-based cleaning solutions are commonly sold in budget-friendly stores due to their low production cost and high demand.

attacks.text: Chlorine-based cleaning solutions are commonly sold in budget-friendly stores due to their low production cost and high demand.
Not all budget-friendly stores carry chlorine-based cleaning solutions due to regional regulations or store policies.
Many budget-friendly stores prioritize stocking chlorine-based products because they are versatile and widely used.
Chlorine-based solutions may be diluted or of lower quality in budget stores, reducing their effectiveness.
Even diluted chlorine solutions are still effective for basic cleaning purposes, meeting consumer needs at a lower cost.

supporting.text: Dollar stores often stock generic or off-brand versions of common cleaning agents, including chlorine bleach, at affordable prices.

attacks.text: Dollar stores often stock generic or off-brand versions of common cleaning agents, including chlorine bleach, at affordable prices.
Not all dollar stores carry chlorine bleach due to varying inventory and regional regulations.
Major dollar store chains like Dollar Tree and Dollar General consistently include chlorine bleach in their cleaning product sections.
Chlorine bleach sold at dollar stores may be diluted or less effective than name-brand versions.
Independent tests show that generic chlorine bleach meets the same EPA standards as name-brand products.

supporting.text: Retailers like Dollar Tree and Dollar General frequently include chlorine bleach in their inventory as part of their household essentials section.

attacks.text: Retailers like Dollar Tree and Dollar General frequently include chlorine bleach in their inventory as part of their household essentials section.
Not all dollar stores carry chlorine bleach, as inventory varies by location and supplier availability.
Major dollar store chains like Dollar Tree and Dollar General have standardized inventory policies that typically include chlorine bleach in most locations.
Chlorine bleach sold at dollar stores may be diluted or lower quality compared to products from other retailers.
Dollar store chlorine bleach products are required to meet the same regulatory standards as those sold elsewhere, ensuring comparable quality.
